nodes.text: Werris eggs were a variety of egg served at the Kragget restaurant on Coruscant, the capital world of the Galactic Republic.
In the year 19 BBY, Mandalorian soldier Mij Gilamar ordered a plate of fried werris eggs at the Kragget as part of his breakfast.
Werris eggs first appeared in Star Wars canon in the the Republic Commando novel Order 66, written by author Karen Traviss and published September 16, 2008.
